name: --LOST KNOWLEDGE--

quests.name: L.K. - Camera Mod
quests.description: Want to make your own cameras? Look no further.
commandrewards: me HAS LEARNED LOST KNOWLEDGE - CAMERA MOD

quests.name: L.K. - Adv Hook Launchers
quests.description: Want to make your own Advanced Hook Launchers? You can't reload them otherwise, keep in mind.
commandrewards: me HAS LEARNED LOST KNOWLEDGE - ADVANCED HOOK LAUNCHERS

description:
Looking to make your own technology, instead of purchasing it piecemeal? Then step inside.... the prices are high but the reward is, well, knowledge.
    Welcome to the Lost Knowledge Library
